source.bd3e243e:
import plotly.express as px
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv("../input/football-deaths/football_deaths.csv")
df['incident_date'] = pd.to_datetime(df['incident_date'])
df['incident_year'] = df['incident_date'].dt.year
df['incident_month'] = df['incident_date'].dt.month

df.head()
source.f57f581d:
t = df['incident_year'].value_counts().to_frame().reset_index()
t = t.rename(columns = {"index" : "year", "incident_year" : "count"})

fig = px.bar(t, x='year', y='count')
fig.update_layout(title = "Football deaths by Years", yaxis_title="Counts", xaxis_title="Year")
fig.show()
source.481cc488:
t = df['team_country'].value_counts().to_frame().reset_index()
t = t.rename(columns = {"index" : "team_country", "team_country" : "count"})
t = t.sort_values("count", ascending = False).head(15)

fig = px.bar(y=t['team_country'][::-1], x=t['count'][::-1])
fig.update_layout(title = "Top Countries with most football deaths", yaxis_title="", xaxis_title="counts")
fig.show()
source.2afab83e:
t = df['player_age'].value_counts().to_frame().reset_index()
t = t.rename(columns = {"index" : "player_age", "player_age" : "count"})

fig = px.bar(t, x='player_age', y='count')
fig.update_layout(title = "Football deaths by Player Age", yaxis_title="Counts", xaxis_title="Player Age")
fig.show()
